title: What to do when i crash after champ select and wont let me reconnect
body: kept on pressing reconnect and it wont work

replies.body: quiet a number of people are having this problem

Likely an issue related to content discussed in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and posting there if you continue to have problems.

well the punishment cant be taken off your account (i can guarantee that)... but i would suggest talking to support and making a ticket to see if there is anything they can do about the technical issue, maybe there is something with your isp/comp/client that they might be able to help you with..

in the mean time ide lay off pvp q'es until you figure it out
how will i know if riot helped me after i submitted a ticket
